name: Heroes_Owned
displayName: Number of Heroes Owned which are Level 1 or above

name: Story_Chapter
displayName: Number of Chapters in the main Campaign that has been Completed

name: Hero_Level_Above_Level_10
displayName: Number of Heroes owned by the player on or above Level 10

name: Side_Quests_Complete
displayName: Number of Side Quests completed

name: Follower_Above_Level_10
displayName: Number of Followers which the player owns on or above Level 10 (num >= 10)

name: Gear_Unique
displayName: Number of Gear Items the player owns at any point in time which are not duplicates

name: Gear_Above_Level_10
displayName: Number of Gear Items which are Level 10 or above (num >= 10)

name: Gear_Above_Level_50
displayName: Number of Gear Items which are Level 50 or above (num >= 50)

name: Spell_Unique
displayName: Number of Spells the player owns at any point in time which are not duplicates

displayName: Number of Spells which are Level 10 or above (num >= 10)

name: Minion_Unique

name: Minion_Above_Level_10
displayName: Number of Minions which are Level 10 or above (num >= 10)

name: Armor_Set_Bonus
displayName: Number of Gear Items in a Gear Set that the player has equipped (should be 2, 4 or 6)

name: Kingdom_Joined
displayName: Boolean if the player has joined a kingdom or not (0 = not joined, 1 = joined)

name: Win_CoOp
displayName: Number of CoOp Battles the player has completed
